root.resource: SELECT a.* FROM [gw_Admin_Menus] a INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT a.[MenuId] FROM [gw_Admin_Menus] a INNER JOIN [gw_Admin_MenusInRoles] b ON a.[MenuId] = b.[MenuId] INNER JOIN [gw_Admin_UsersInRoles] c ON c.[RoleId] = b.[RoleId] WHERE a.[ParentId] = @ParentId AND a.[ApplicationId] = @ApplicationId AND c.[UserId] = @UserId ) b ON a.[MenuId] = b.[MenuId] ORDER BY a.[OrderNum] DESC
SELECT * FROM [gw_Admin_Menus] WHERE [ParentId] = @ParentId AND [ApplicationId] = @ApplicationId ORDER BY [OrderNum] DESC

| --业务数据 select PC_ID as ID,'A' as Deepth, PC_Name as Name from gw_General_ProductClass --RoleBegin-- where PC_ID in (select ID from gw_Product_AdminRoles where RoleID in (@myRoleID) AND type=0) --RoleEnd-- order by PC_OrderNum | --业务协议 select Pid as ID,Pname as Name from GW_General_Protocol order by Pname | --业务平台 select PE_ID as ID,PE_Name as Name from gw_General_ProductEvment | --运营商 select I_ID as ID,I_NAME as Name from GW_General_ISP | --业务状态 select PS_ID as ID,PS_Name as Name from GW_General_ProductStat | --计费模式 select AT_ID as ID,AT_Name as Name from GW_General_AccountType | --SP SELECT [SP_ID] as ID ,[Name] FROM [GW_SP_Info]
